values: yeah! def. haven't updated in a while! alot has been going on! but you probably already know about it, so i'll make this brief... life is fucked up! and honestly...idk wtf is going on, at least between me & ryan! one mintue we're happy 2gether and everything is great! then the next, he doesn't want me! :'( i tried 2 work things out, but idk if he listened 2 me! :( idk! ♥Lissy "I'm not the kinda girl who gives up just like that! Oh no!"

this is my LAST PUBLIC entry....cuz i just found out that even tho only 3people (that ik of) that read my entries, somebody (not saying who) just blabbed my personal feelings and thoughts 2 an adult that i DON'T aprove of knowing about my personal life...so if u wanna know whats going on in my life either get a livejournal account and be my friend or call and ask! if not...oh well! 

bye

♥Lissy

okay, this all needs to stop, NOW! 
stop it all before i go insane!
i'm not asking for much!
just one word.
"STOP"!

"Calling You"

There's something I can't quite explain
I'm so in love with you
You'll never take that away
And if I've said it a hundred times before
Expect a thousand more
You'll never take that away

So expect me to be
Calling you to see
If you're okay when I'm not around
Asking "if you love me"
I love the way you make it sound
Calling you to see
Do I try too hard to make you smile?
To make us smile

[Chorus]
I will keep calling you to see
If you're sleeping, are you dreaming
If you're dreaming, are you dreaming of me
I can't believe you actually picked me

I thought that the world had lost it's sway
It's so hard sometimes
Then I fell in love with you
Then came you
And you took that away
It's not so difficult
The world is not so difficult
You take away the old
Show me the new
And I feel like I can fly when I stand next to you
So while I'm on this phone
A hundred miles from home
I'll take the words you gave me and send them back to you

I only want to see
If you're okay when I'm not around
Asking "if you love me"
I love the way you make it sound
Calling you to see
Do I try too hard to make you smile?
To make us smile

[Chorus]

alright so hi! i can't believe i'm updating another entry 2day! jeeze! i haven't updated twice in a week in a long time! anyways...omg! lately i'm been in soo much better moods! and we all know y! (if u don't, then o well!) lol i just i'm pretty much...scared of being happy....er. cuz "Im AfRaId Of BeInG hApPy BeCaUsE EvErYtImE i Am HaPpY sOmEtHiNg BaD aLwAyS hApPeNs!" (no i didn't type it like that!) yea...so...i guess it's okay that i'm "happier" but i have 2 always prepare for the WORST! yea! well i'm at school and i don't feel like typing anymore, so i'm gonna go now

sry i haven't been updating. just nothing has really changed but my moods. i'm still depressed as all-get-out! but...idk! and last night, i def. said/did the worst possible thing i could ever do at a time like this! but i really don't wanna talk about that! anyways...

besides that, this weekend was pretty good! Friday, i did nothing. but that can't always be bad! Saturday, i slept over Mel's house! that was fun! we watched this movie called "Thirteen"! omg! it was A-MA-ZING!! Sunday, me & Mel went to the mall and stuff. that was fun 2! i bought "Thirteen" on sale! :) lol yea then i went 2 my grandparent's house. so my weekend was good, until Sunday late at night! but i don't wanna get into that!

soo...yea! i'm at school now and it's 9:48am. so i'm gonna go now! next update will hopefully be on Wed. night or Thrusday. yea! 

♥Lissy

Lithium, don't want to lock me up inside.
Lithium, don't want to forget how it feels without...
Lithium, I want to stay in love with my sorrow.
Oh, but God, I want to let it go.

Come to bed, don't make me sleep alone.
Couldn't hide the emptiness, you let it show.
Never wanted it to be so cold.
Just didn't drink enough to say you love me.

I can't hold on to me,
Wonder what's wrong with me.

Lithium, don't want to lock me up inside.
Lithium, don't want to forget how it feels without...
Lithium, I want to stay in love with my sorrow.

Don't want to let it lay me down this time.
Drown my will to fly.
Here in the darkness I know myself.
Can't break free until I let it go.
Let me go.

Darling, I forgive you after all.
Anything is better than to be alone.
And in the end I guess I had to fall.
Always find my place among the ashes.

I can't hold on to me,
Wonder what's wrong with me.

Lithium, don't want to lock me up inside.
Lithium, don't want to forget how it feels without...
Lithium, ...stay in love with my sorrow.
I'm gonna let it go.

yea ok...so...last entry i said, "my life is messed up!" now i say "MY LIFE IS FUCKED UP!" i can only handle so much! 1st i get myself into a really bad situation! and in the end......i think i might be losing my BEST FRIEND! :( thats a really scary thought! cuz idk where i'd be without her! i'd probably be in a mental hospital or have shoot myself by now! and omg! i just don't know! and on top of that....i close friend of mine...wants to date me! and u'd think that'd be a good thing! well....it would if i was bi or lez! and my last thing that makes my life a nightmare is that my "bf" keeps "harassing" me about sending him pics of me! i mean...i LOVE taking pics of myself! lol but i don't like 2 be "harassed" about it! yea! Schools a mess! and at this point i feel as if....nobody cares anymore....and that i have basically lost all my friends! just because of the mistakes i made with a someone by the name of "ryan!" so yea! whatelse is new! well....i g2g get my Capp. to wake up! cuz i'm at school now! and if i don't get some...i'm going 2 be out by 2nd period! well...yea! i hope u had fun reading my stupid entry!


♥Lissy


PS-just so everybody know.....me & ryan aren't talking anymore..because of personal reasons!

hi!
ok so it's me again.

yea nothing has really changed from the last entry! same old, same old! which really sucks! and on top of everything still being shity....i have like 6 different emotions going on at once! which is INSANE! but w/e! good thing these emotions are 4 2 different reasons/situations! i'm nervous, excited, lost, confused, worry, scared, & stressed out! but most of those aren't suprising at all! the only new emotions are....that i'm nervous, excited, and....worry(i think is new)! cuz i've always been lost, confused, worry, scared & stressed out! 

alright well since i'm at school now (7:09am) i'm going 2 finish cuz i wanta get some Capp! :) YUMMY! lol by i don't wanta end on a sour note soo...


I LOVE MCR!!! :) :-D

I Love them all! 4 different reasons! but at the moment...GERARD WAY IS MY LIFE SAVER!! lol :) :-D<Linda knows what i'm talking about...ok well...bye!
yea alright...so...idk what 2 type/write 2day! everything is so confusing! and nothing makes scene! and yet again..i'm back 2 square 1! and idk! so i'm pretty much fucked up! which isn't a surprise!

Why does this have to be so hard?
Why can't I just let go?
Why did you do this to me?
After everything I've done for you,
and this is what I get?!
Of all the things you could have done,
why didn't you just shot me!
It would have been quick and easy!
This isn't fair!
I hate you!

I never want to let you down or have you go, it's better off this way.
For all the dirty looks, the photographs your boyfriend took,

I'm not okay
I'm not okay

I'm okay

(I'm okay, now)

But you really need to listen to me
Because I'm telling you the truth
I mean this, I'm okay!
(Trust Me)

I'm not okay
I'm not okay
Well, I'm not okay
I'm not o-fucking-kay
I'm not okay
I'm not okay

PS-yes my life is still a nightmare! at least at the moment....

An empty room can be so deafening,
The silence makes you wanna scream,
It drives you crazy.
I chased away the shadows of your name,
And burned the picture in a frame,
But it couldn't save me.

And how could we quit something we never even tried,
Well you still can't tell me why.

We built it up,
To watch it fall.
Like we meant nothing at all.
I gave and gave the best of me,
But couldn't give you what you need.
You walked away,
You stole my life,
Just to find what you're looking for.
But no matter how I try,
I can't hate you anymore.
...I can't hate you anymore.

You're not the person that you used to be,
The one I want who wanted me,
And that's a shame but,
There's only so many tears that you can cry.
Before it drains the light right from your eyes,
And I can't go on that way.
And so I'm letting go of everything we were,
It doesn't mean it doesn't hurt.

We built it up,
To watch it fall.
Like we meant nothing at all.
I gave and gave the best of me,
But couldn't give you what you need.
You walked away,
You stole my life,
Just to find what you're looking for.
But no matter how I try,
I can't hate you anymore.

Sometimes you hold so tight,
It slips right through your hands.
Will I ever understand?

We built it up,
To watch it fall.
Like we meant nothing at all.
I gave and gave the best of me,
But couldn't give you what you need.
You walked away,
You stole my life,
Just to find what you're looking for.
But no matter how I try,
I can't hate you anymore [x2]

ok, just so ur all up 2 speed.....this entry is just 2 answer "Anonymous's" question! which is really really stupid question but w/e. i have time! but whoever "Anonymous" is have 2 tell me! or i'll track u down! cuz my friend knows how 2 do that! NO LIE! anyways....

the respond/question that "Anonymous" left was:
"So what exactly happened that could make you this mad at someone? You sound so upset! no one should have to feel like that"

the answer!:

well lets c,.....i dated my ex, Ryan, 4 almost 3YEARS! and during those 3years! he told me lies right through his teeth! and my mistake was believeing every damn word he said! for explain: 

"I LOVE YOU 4EVER!" "I NEVER WANTA BE WITH ANY OTHER GIRL!" "YOUR MY LIFE" and he even had conversations with me about our life after highschool! like college and MARRIAGE and even starting a FAMILY! and sooo much more lies about how much i mean 2 him and how much he "loves me" but it was all bullshit! soo...

it ended like this....
ok latley, i've been turning myself down cuz i basically had NO self-esteem! so i was talking 2 a counsler 2 help me through it! cuz at 1point during the summer i was going through a depression! (long story!)  but anyways....so like Oct. 4th he calls me and basically said that i need 2 get better and we need 2 take a "break" and maybe date other people and then maybe get back 2gether! at 1st i was really really upset! and i wanted 2 actually know what was really going 2 happen, so i told him 2 look in my eyes and say "we're never going 2 get back 2gether and i don't love you" and he said "no, i can't say that" and i said "y?!" and he said "cuz it's not true!" so after a while, i thought about it and we like "uk what? maybe this is a good idea, take a break and then when everything is better we'll get back 2gether" but then on, i think, Oct 15th. he calls me up and says "we're NEVER going 2 get back 2gether!" that just proves that he lies right there! how he said that it's not true that we were NEVER going 2 get back 2gether! and then he said we are NEVER going 2 get back 2gether! what a fucking LIAR!!

but w/e! whats done is done! there's nothing i can do about it! i can't change what he said! or all the lies he told me! at least when i said thos things..I MEANT THEM! so yea! 

the 2nd part 2 ur statement is: DAMN RIGHT I'M UPSET!! 

and the 3rd part 2 ur statement is: DAMN RIGHT! but theres nothing i can do 2 stop this feeling! i fell in love! and he don't love me anymore! and yea! which is my mistake! but w/e

THERES YOUR ANSWER "ANONYMOUS" hope your happy!

ok so here's whats going on....Ryan had 2 be a fucking liar 4 the past 3years! and so on top on how he broke up with me on 10/4, i think it was, and telling me it's up 2 me whether or not we get back 2gether, 2day he calls me and says that we're NEVER going 2 get back 2gether again at all! w/e he's such a stupid fucking liar! o! and it's kinda in a way funny how he wants me 2 believe that he "loves" me and shit when he says that he's never going 2 go back out with me! even when i'm getting help from my counsler not only 4 myself! but 2 help our relationship! but w/e! he can suck his own damn cock! cuz i'm through with this! 

♥Lissy

and by the way....ik how my name on this livejournal is "xryans_babygrl" and i would change it but then i would have 2 make a new livejournal and thats just a waste of my time! so I'M NOT HIS GIRL ANYMORE!!!

Miss self sufficient

So, by keepin her heart protected,
She'd never ever feel rejected

She fell in love.

What is this feelin' takin' over?
Thinkin' no one could open her door
Surprise, it's time
To feel what's real

Goodbye, old you

Miss play it smart
Miss if you wanna use that line you better not start, noooo

She didn't wanna end up jaded
And this miss, decided not to miss out on true love, so
By changing a misconception 
She went in a new direction
And found inside, she felt a connection
She fell in love.

To feel what's real (what's real)

She looked in the mirror and thought today

How beautiful love could truly be

I'm so glad I've finally seen...

Surprise (surprise)...It's time (yeah)
To feel (to feel) what's real
What happened to Miss Independent?
No longer need to be defensive
Goodbye (goodbye), old you (you)
When love, when love is true..."
it's over, it's done! it was all a lie! :'(

"I have to block out thoughts of you so I don't lose my head 
They crawl in like a cockroach leaving babies in my bed 
Dropping little reels of tape to remind me that I'm alone 
Playing movies in my head that make a porno feel like home 
There's a burning in my pride, a nervous bleeding in my brain 
An ounce of peace is all I want for you. Will you never call again? 
And will you never say that you love me just to put it in my face? 
And will you never try to reach me? It is I that wanted space 

Hate me today 
Hate me tomorrow 
Hate me so you can finally see what's good for you 

I'm sober now for 3 whole months it's one accomplishment that you helped me with 
The one thing that always tore us apart is the one thing I won't touch again 
In a sick way I want to thank you for holding my head up late at night 
While I was busy waging wars on myself, you were trying to stop the fight 
You never doubted my warped opinions on things like suicidal hate 
You made me compliment myself when it was way too hard to take 
So I'll drive so fucking far away that I never cross your mind 
And do whatever it takes in your heart to leave me behind 

Hate me today 
Hate me tomorrow 
Hate me for all the things I didn't do for you 

Hate me in ways 
Yeah ways hard to swallow 
Hate me so you can finally see what's good for you 

And with a sad heart I say bye to you and wave 
Kicking shadows on the street for every mistake that I had made 
And like a baby boy I never was a man 
Until I saw your blue eyes crying and I held your face in my hand 
And then I fell down yelling "make it go away!" 
Just make a smile come back and shine just like it used to be 
And then she whispered "How can you do this to me?" 

Hate me today 
Hate me tomorrow 
Hate me for all the things I didn't do for you 

Hate me in ways 
Yeah ways hard to swallow 
Hate me so you can finally see what's good for you"




YEA JUST FUCKING HATE ME!! :( :'(

hi again. well 2day i decided 2 ride my bike 2 the library 2 go on the computer 2 get Ryan out of my mind! but it hasn't been working very well so far. anyways...last weekend (july 21-23) wasn't "that" bad. it was alright. but i'm just soo lost! :( id understand! id understand Ryan! he doesn't make sence! 1 day he'll tell me 1 thing, and then the next day he'll say sometime totally different!! but the worst part of last weekend was that he sucked up 2 me! and got what he wanted!!! i tried my BEST! 2 fight it but i couldn't!! cuz i love him soooooo much! i'll love him 4 the rest of my LIFE!! no lie!! i just wish that all the things he said 2 me, on saturday, that made me happy were true! :( but i think they were all lies! 2, like i said b4, suck up 2 me and get what he wanted!
this has been the HARDEST thing in my life!! (so far) at this point i wish i hadn't don't half the things i did!!! :(
i just wish he loved me, the way i love him!! :( :'( i love him more then he'll ever love me in his lifetime!!! and it anything happened 2 him i'd die!!! and if he,somehow, ended up in the hospital! i'd be by his side the whole time!!! and i'd NEVER leave his side!!!
Ryan if u happen 2 read this i just want 2 tell u that i'm sry that i've been a bitch lately, and i'm sry 4 the times i've been mean 2 u! and I LOVE AND CARE ABOUT YOU SOOOO MUCH!!! and NO MATTER WHAT HAPPENS I'LL ALWAYS LOVE AND CARE ABOUT YOU, EVEN IF U DON'T LOVE OR CARE ABOUT ME!! I AM HEARTBROKEN!!! :( :'(
♥Lissy
"Sombody ripped my heart out...and left me here to bleed..."

so yea! hi i'm at school right now, but it's not like anybody cares. anyways....well.....what should i talk about in this stupid entry! lol ummmm.......lets talk about whats going on in my sad lonely life. well...let i said b4 i'm at school so i'll start there...

well 2day i woke up at 6:00am let i do every school day. and brushed my hair, went 2 the bathroom, then i brushed my teeth, then got dressed and then brushed my hair again and when i was done it was 6:06am yes! 6:06am! it takes me only 6mins 2 get ready 4 school. anyways then i went downstairs and layed on the couch 4 20mins. then my mom woke me up and said "ok it's time 2 go". so then my mom drove me 2 school and the sun was in my eyes and it hurt! then i got 2 school at 6:35am and sat down at the cafe. and got myself a drink. (french vanilla and hot chocolate mixed 2gether =) ) then at 7:00am i went 2 go fine my friend Steph! so i talked 2 Steph and Steph until 7:17am then i went 2 my 1st class Math. that was pretty boring! we had a sub. which ik and i'm friends with =). and we had a quiz and a review packet and when we were done she gave us these fun worksheet things. 

after Math i went 2 advisement (aka studyhall) and i did my homework and now i'm typing this entry! yep! thats my day so far! pretty boring! but after this i'm going 2 GLOBAL "favortie class" NOT!!! then lunch, then back 2 global! then Earth Science! eww!! I HATE EARTH SCIENCE!!! but only cuz my stupid freakin' teacher! he freakin' hates me 4 NO REASON!! i hate that!! when somebody hates u 4 NNNNOOOO REASON at ALLL!!! and the worst part is that my Earth Science teacher (Mr. Humpheys) is my advisement teacher 2!!! **rolling eyes** o well!

anyways....2day after school i have a freakin' piano lesson 2day, and i don't really like piano lessons cuz idk! it's hard! and i screw up! ALLLLL the time!!! but w/e! then i'm going this Youth Group party! and yea! the only bad part is that Ryan has 2 work 2night so he can't go! :( o well! i'll live! but he might come over 2morrow night cuz of band practice! my dad might pick him up and get home at like 5:10pmish and band practice starts at 7:20pmish! and he'll stay until 10pmish when band practice ends. so yea! but he might not cuz he has other plans, but they might be canceled! but it doesn' really matter cuz idk whats going on between me and him! (again) guys r soooo confusing!! they are totally hard 2 understand!!! like...when i talk 2 him asking him if he really loves me he says "yea! i do love you!" but then on the phone when he gets off he never says "i love you" it's always 

ryan:"well i'm gonna go now"
me: "ok, ttyl then"
ryan: "ok, bye"
me:"....bye"

yea! id understand! some of u might be thinking "well u didn't say "i love you" either" well i believe that whoever is choosing 2 leave should say "i love you" 1st! cuz yea! i understand if he didn't say "i love you" cuz he was going 2 call me back later that day, but he wasn't! so yea! and some of u might be thinking "well he shouldn't have 2 say "i love you" all the time!" well thats not what i want! i only want him 2 say if he means it! and if thats the end 4 the night, cuz u NEVER know when somebody could die or end up in the hospital!!! so the last think u should he somebody say is  "i love you"! cuz if they do end up dying and the last words u hear aren't "i love you" then u'll never know if they loved u! thats what i believe!! so yea! omg! this is soo weird! cuz i'm randomly shaking! my hands r shaking! and it's creeping my out! 

well i should go now! cuz this is a mad long entry 4 me! and idk what else 2 say at the moment!! and my hands 4 shaking (like i said b4) so yea!


~"I Love You"~

bye


-Lissy :(
